required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Tolerability of Symbicort as an add-on Treatment to Spiriva Compare With Spiriva Alone in Patients With Severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomised, Parallel-group, Open-label, Multicentre, 3-month Phase IV, Efficacy and Tolerability Study of Budesonide/Formoterol (Symbicort® Turbuhaler® 160/4.5μg/Inhalation, 2 Inhalations Twice Daily) Added to Tiotropium (SpirivaTM 18 μg/Inhalation, 1 Inhalation Once Daily) Compared With Tiotropium (SpirivaTM18 μg/Inhalation, 1 Inhalation Once Daily) Alone in Severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Patients

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multicentre study with a randomised, parallel group, open-label, 3-month phase IV design to assess the efficacy and tolerability of Symbicort as an add-on treatment to Spiriva compare with Spiriva alone in patients with severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (week 0) and mean in treatment period (weeks 1, 6, 12) measured before inhalation of study drug
primary_outcome.description: Ratio of pre-dose FEV1 (Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second) in treatment period to baseline value

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-dose FEV1 at 5 Minutes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (-2 weeks) and mean in treatment period (1, 6, 12 weeks) measured at 5 minutes after inhalation of study drug
secondary_outcome.description: Ratio of post-dose FEV1 at 5 minutes to baseline value

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-dose FEV1 at 60 Minutes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (measured before inhalation of study drug at week 0) and mean in treatment period (measured at 1 hour after inhalation of study drug at weeks 0, 1, 6, 12)
secondary_outcome.description: Ratio of post-dose FEV1 at 60 minutes to baseline value

secondary_outcome.measure: Pre-dose FVC
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (measured before inhalation of study drug at week 0) and mean in treatment period (measured at 1 hour after inhalation of study drug at weeks 0, 1, 6, 12)
secondary_outcome.description: Ratio of pre-dose FVC (Forced Vital Capacity) in treatment period to baseline value

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-dose FVC at 5 Minutes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (measured before inhalation of study drug at week 0) and mean in treatment period (measured at 5 minutes after inhalation of study drug at weeks 0, 1, 6, 12)
secondary_outcome.description: Ratio of post-dose FVC at 5 minutes to baseline value

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-dose FVC at 60 Minutes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (measured before inhalation of study drug at week 0) and mean in treatment period (measured at 1 hour after inhalation of study drug at weeks 0, 1, 6, 12)
secondary_outcome.description: Ratio of post-dose FVC at 60 minutes to baseline value

secondary_outcome.measure: Pre-dose IC
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (week 0) and mean in treatment period (weeks 1, 6, 12) measured before inhalation of study drug
secondary_outcome.description: Ratio of pre-dose IC (Inspiratory Capacity) in treatment period to baseline value

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-dose IC at 60 Minutes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (measured before inhalation of study drug at week 0) and mean in treatment period (measured at 1 hour after inhalation of study drug at weeks 0, 1, 6, 12)
secondary_outcome.description: Ratio of post-dose IC at 60 minutes to baseline value

secondary_outcome.measure: Pre-dose PEF in Last Week of Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured before inhalation of study drug in the last week of treatment, up to 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Change in pre-dose morning PEF (Peak Expiratory Flow) from run-in period to last week of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Pre-dose PEF in First Week of Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured before inhalation of study drug in the first week of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change in pre-dose morning PEF (Peak Expiratory Flow) from run-in period to first week of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Pre-dose PEF in Whole Treatment Period
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured before inhalation of study drug in whole treatment period of 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Change in pre-dose morning PEF from run-in period to whole treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-dose PEF in Last Week of Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured at 5 minutes after inhalation of study drug in the last week of treatment, up to 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Change in post-dose morning PEF at 5 minutes from run-period to last week of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-dose PEF in First Week of Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured at 5 minutes after inhalation of study drug in the first week of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change in post-dose morning PEF at 5 minutes from run-in period to first week of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-dose PEF in Whole Treatment Period
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured at 5 minutes after inhalation of study drug in whole treatment period of 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Change in post-dose morning PEF at 5 minutes from run-period to whole treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Use of Reliever Medication During Day in the Last Week on Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured during day in the last week on treatment, up to 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Change in the number of inhalations of reliever medication during day from run-in period to the last week on treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Use of Reliever Medication During Day in the First Week on Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured during day in the first week on treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change in the number of inhalations of reliever medication during day from run-in period to the first week on treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Use of Reliever Medication During Day in the Whole Treatment Period
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured during day in the whole treatment period of 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Change in the number of inhalations of reliever medication during day from run-in period to the whole treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Use of Reliever Medication During Night in the Last Week on Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured during day in the last week on treatment, up to 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Change in the number of inhalations of reliever medication during night from run-in period to the last week on treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Use of Reliever Medication During Night in the First Week on Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured during night in the first week on treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change in the number of inhalations of reliever medication during day from run-in period to the first week on treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Use of Reliever Medication During Night in the Whole Treatment Period
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured during day in the whole treatment period of 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Change in the number of inhalations of reliever medication during night from run-in period to the whole treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in COPD Symptoms - Breathing
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements in the whole treatment period of 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Change in breathing symptom score (from 0:none to 4:severe) from run-in period

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in COPD Symptoms - Cough
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements in the whole treatment period of 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Change in Cough symptom score (from 0:none to 4:severe) from run-in period

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in COPD Symptoms - Sputum
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements in the whole treatment period of 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Change in Sputum symptom score (from 0:none to 4:severe) from run-in period

secondary_outcome.measure: COPD Exacerbations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Whole treatment period of 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Severe exacerbations requiring systemic steroids (oral ≥3 days or parenteral) or hospitalisation or emergency room treatment due to worsening of COPD symptoms

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Signed and dated informed consent
- Men or women patients ≥40 years of age
- Diagnosis of COPD with symptoms for more than 2 years and there is a history of at least one COPD exacerbation requiring a course of oral steroids and/or antibiotics within 1-12 months before Visit 2
- Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (FEV1) ≤50% of predicted normal value, pre-bronchodilator and Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (FEV1) / Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) < 70%, pre-bronchodilator
- Total symptom score of 2 or more per day for at least half of run-in period (breathing, cough and sputum scores from the diary card) and complete morning recordings of Digital Peak Flow Meter data at least 7 out of the last 10 days of the run-in period
Exclusion Criteria:
- A history of asthma and seasonal allergic rhinitis before 40 years of age
- Patients who have experienced exacerbation of COPD requiring hospitalisation and /or emergency room treatment and/or a course of oral steroids and/or intravenous corticosteroids and/or antibiotics within 4 weeks prior to Visit 2 and/or during run-in period and also the patients who use of systemic glucocorticosteroids (GCS) within 4 weeks and/or inhaled GCS within 2 weeks prior to Visit 2 and/or during run-in period
- Patients with relevant cardiovascular disorder judged by the investigator
- Patients with glaucoma, prostatic hyperplasia or bladder-neck obstruction judged by the investigator
- Women who are pregnant, breast-feeding or of child-bearing potential judged by the investigator

overall_official.affiliation: AstraZeneca Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd., Shanghai, China

clinical_study.keyword: Severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) patients

participant_flow.recruitment_details: There are 793 patients enrolled. 578 patients were randomized, where there are 287 patients randomized in Symbicort+ Spiriva group and 291 in Spiriva group

group.title: Symbicort+Spiriva
group.description: Budesonide/formoterol (Symbicort Turbuhaler 160/4.5μg/inhalation, 2 inhalations twice daily) added to tiotropium (Spiriva 18 μg/inhalation, 1 inhalation once daily)

participants_list.participants: 'Full Analysis Set' used for efficacy analysis
'Full Analysis Set' used for efficacy analysis
'Safety Analysis Set' =287+3-1=289. 3 and 1 pts in respective groups received opposite treatment.

baseline.population: Overall Number of Baseline Participants is not different from the Milestones.

outcome.time_frame: Mean of daily measurements in run-in period (the last 10 days before randomization) and mean of daily measurements measured during day in the last week on treatment, up to 12 weeks
outcome.population: FAS (287 + 290); less number of patients analyzed was caused by missing values.

group.title: Symbicort+Spiriva
group.description: Budesonide/formoterol (Symbicort Turbuhaler 160/4.5μg/inhalation, 2 inhalations twice daily) added to tiotropium (Spiriva 18 μg/inhalation, 1 inhalation once daily)

measure.title: Use of Reliever Medication During Night in the Last Week on Treatment
measure.description: Change in the number of inhalations of reliever medication during night from run-in period to the last week on treatment
measure.population: FAS (287 + 290); less number of patients analyzed was caused by missing values.

analysis.method_desc: Additive ANCOVA model with treatment and centre as fixed factors and the run-in mean of pre-dose morning PEF as a covariate

outcome.title: COPD Exacerbations
outcome.description: Severe exacerbations requiring systemic steroids (oral ≥3 days or parenteral) or hospitalisation or emergency room treatment due to worsening of COPD symptoms
outcome.time_frame: Whole treatment period of 12 weeks
outcome.population: FAS (287 + 290); less number of patients analyzed was caused by missing values.

group.title: Symbicort+Spiriva

measure.title: COPD Exacerbations
measure.description: Severe exacerbations requiring systemic steroids (oral ≥3 days or parenteral) or hospitalisation or emergency room treatment due to worsening of COPD symptoms
measure.population: FAS (287 + 290); less number of patients analyzed was caused by missing values.

analysis.method_desc: Poisson regression model with treatment as a factor and the duration time in study as an offset variable morning PEF as a covariate
